short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your New Tab page with a real-time age counter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Motivation Tab is designed to enhance your browsing experience and boost your motivation with every new search. Keep your motivation high by seeing your precise age, accurate calculated down to the very second. No more mundane blank pages — personalise your new tab to match your personality and make a browsing experience uniquely yours.

Features:

✓ Accurate age counter
Reliably track your age with precision and accuracy, ensuring you're always up-to-date and highly motivated.

✓ Variety of themes
Explore a rich variety of themes to find the perfect look for your browsing, reflecting your personality and preferences.

✓ Simple setup
Simply install the extension, input your date of birth, and let Motivation Tab do the rest. 

✓ Settings sync
Your settings follow you wherever you go when you sync with your Google account.
